title: Look Who Gensler Met with before Filing Amicus Brief Against Ripple In January
body: A recently surfaced calendar entry from January 8, 2025, has drawn attention to a meeting former SEC Chair Gary Gensler held with officials from Better Markets, a financial reform advocacy group. Digital Asset Investor (@digitalassetbuy), a well-known cryptocurrency commentator, posted the image on X, suggesting the meeting was kept hidden and questioning its implications in the SEC’s legal battle against Ripple. Dirty Gary Gensler's full calendar(the one he kept hidden) is out. Well Well Well look who Gary met with before they filed an Amicus Brief supporting the SEC against @ripple ? @bgarlinghouse @s_alderoty @JohnEDeaton1 https://t.co/POKgfYtZnP pic.twitter.com/wrl0nBxTsf — Digital Asset Investor (@digitalassetbuy) February 15, 2025 The Meeting and Its Significance The document shows that at 2:00 PM on January 8, 2025, Gensler met with multiple representatives from Better Markets , including Stephen Hall, Legal Director & Securities Specialist; Ben Schiffrin, Director of Securities Policy; Brady Williams, Legal Counsel; and Cale Keable. This meeting is more notable now, as Better filed an amicus brief supporting the SEC against Ripple just 14 days later. The timing of Gensler’s meeting with Better Markets, followed by their legal support of the SEC, has led to speculation about the extent of coordination between the regulator and external advocacy groups. Gensler’s War On Cryptocurrencies The meeting and subsequent filing by Better Markets is an example of Gensler’s broader anti-crypto agenda. The former SEC Chair aggressively went after Ripple and other prominent crypto companies like Coinbase. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The SEC, under Gensler’s leadership, unfairly targeted digital assets, and this meeting is further evidence that the SEC sought to strengthen its case against Ripple by securing public legal support from groups like Better Markets. Better Markets shares his anti-XRP stance, as shortly after the Ripple lawsuit’s final ruling in July, its CEO stated that the regulator had a 90% to defeat Ripple if it appealed the ruling. His war on the crypto market kept prices down, discouraging many investors and significantly hampering the industry. However, his actions are now being exposed, and this revelation adds to the scrutiny surrounding Gensler’s tenure, particularly as he was already facing investigations before leaving office. What’s Next For the Ripple-SEC Lawsuit? While Gensler is no longer in office, the impact of his policies and regulatory actions continues to shape the digital asset industry. With the SEC still pursuing various enforcement actions against crypto firms, many experts believe the regulator will soon dismiss these cases. The SEC’s new stance on crypto is more friendly, as it has acknowledged multiple XRP ETF applications and the broader crypto community believes that ETF approval and the end of the lawsuit are just around the corner. title: Biggest XRP Critic Flips—Now Expects Price To Skyrocket To Nearly 900%
body: The crypto world is seeing an interesting show as people who used to be against XRP suddenly change their minds. At the center of this development is Davinci Jeremie, who was once known as “the biggest XRP hater” but now predicts that the coin will reach a price of $20 to $24. Related Reading: No $200K Bitcoin? Former Critics Join The Bullish Chorus Real Vision CEO Raoul Pal and experienced trader Peter Brandt are also in a good mood. Brandt now thinks the market will be worth $500 billion, which means the price will be $8. This is a big change from his earlier doubts. With the current price of $2.44, these forecasts show XRP may see profits ranging from 227% to an incredible 883%. $XRP TO $20-$24 this bull run says Davinci biggest $XRP HATER on this planet! What do you think about it? Huge shift in price prediction by Davinci! From $XRP going to $0 , TO now $XRP going to $24 🤔🤔🤔 pic.twitter.com/65kSwViVjD — Random Crypto Pal (@RandomCryptoPal) February 1, 2025 The Sweet Taste Of Vindication For XRP Supporters Tony Edward, the person behind the Thinking Crypto podcast, was unable to resist highlighting the absurdity. “The capitulation of XRP haters is a beautiful thing to behold,” he observed, emphasizing the urgency with which billionaire financial leaders and influencers, such as Mike Novogratz, are adjusting their stances. The community’s reaction has been a combination of triumph and “I told you so” attitudes, as they observe former critics attempt to realign themselves with XRP’s upward trajectory. The XRP Army is having a field day documenting each conversation, as this shift in sentiment has become a talking point across social media platforms. The $XRP hater capitulation is a beautiful thing to behold. From influencers like Davinchi to hedge fund leaders like Mike Novogratz. All of them are bending the knee, many were not allocated and they are now scrambling to buy and cover their tracks so they don’t look like… https://t.co/pA2Paj9MDh — Tony Edward (Thinking Crypto Podcast) (@ThinkingCrypto1) February 13, 2025 Banking Ties Remain A Point Of Contention Though his pricing view is positive, Jeremie keeps a complicated connection with XRP’s basic value proposition. He is worried about the underlying flaws in the conventional banking system, which is intimately related with XRP. Though many supporters consider the crypto as an enabler, Jeremie sees its link with traditional financial infrastructure as a drawback. According to him, XRP’s operational structure and conventional institutions like the Federal Reserve create an element of uncertainty that makes it unfit for long-term investment. He sees similarities between the two. Changing Mindsets This changing narrative within the cryptocurrency sector illustrates how market dynamics can compel even the most fervent critics to reevaluate their stances. The way the XRP community reacted to these changes shows how emotionally attached many people are to the project’s success. Related Reading: $1,000 Solana? title: US Officials Crack Down on Bitcoin Mining Hardware Imports: Report
body: Bitcoin mining hardware is facing increased scrutiny from US officials. Recent seizures at entry points hint at a broader enforcement push that could impact major manufacturers and miners alike. At the request of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), US Customs and Border Protection (CBP) has been seizing bitcoin mining ASICs at ports of entry across the country. According to CBP documents reviewed by Blockspace and insider sources, the agency has also started detaining mining equipment from MicroBT and Canaan. The CBP has intensified its enforcement efforts, expanding on last year’s detention of Antminer S21 and T21 miners, which were reportedly held due to their AI chips from the now-restricted firm Sophgo. Now, CBP appears to have broadened its scope to include MicroBT and Canaan ASICs and, for the first time, is also confiscating Bitmain units since beginning these actions last autumn. A CBP letter stated that the miners were “seized and subject to forfeiture” under U.S. legal code 19 USC 1595a(c)(2)(A). It includes restrictions on unauthorized communications equipment, radio frequency devices that cause interference, and hardware lacking FCC approval or compliance. With detainments expanding, Synteq Digital cofounder and CEO Taras Kulyk stated that nearly all Asian ASIC manufacturers are experiencing customs clearance problems. A source confirmed that multiple clients have had hardware seized at new ports beyond Detroit and San Francisco, and another company is now seeking legal partners to fight the seizures. The latest crackdown may be tied to the Trump administration’s push to bring key silicon-based industries back to the US. Given the scale of Bitcoin mining operations and their reliance on silicon, this effort is in line with Trump’s goal of supporting domestic miners to mine the remaining 1.042 million Bitcoin. The post US Officials Crack Down on Bitcoin Mining Hardware Imports: Report appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: CEO Of Failing Project Joins Messari Founder To Criticize Ripple and XRP
body: Gene Hoffman, the CEO of Chia Network, recently made critical remarks about XRP, suggesting that the cryptocurrency could lead to an event similar to the collapse of Enron, and accusing Ripple of misleading investors with false promises. Hoffman’s post included a popular meme with the caption “Mockchains everywhere,” implying that many blockchain projects, including the XRP Ledger (XRPL), are fundamentally flawed. This strong critique was met with mixed reactions, as XRP has been unfairly suppressed due to regulatory challenges rather than internal mismanagement or fraud. Comparing Chia to XRP While Hoffman criticized XRP, Cobb (@Cobb_XRPL), a well-known crypto trader, pointed out the significant decline of Chia’s token, XCH. The Chia token, which once peaked at $1,934.51 in May 2021, has since plummeted significantly, and is now trading around $13. BREAKING: CEO of Chia chain thinks Ripple/XRP is the Enron of crypto pic.twitter.com/XculO2K2vu — Cobb (@Cobb_XRPL) February 15, 2025 Cobb highlighted the irony of Hoffman’s criticism given Chia’s poor market performance. This represents a decline of over 99%, suggesting that Chia may be an example of a failed or overhyped project. In contrast, XRP has shown resilience despite legal battles with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Since November 2024, XRP has performed well, defying earlier negative predictions from critics like Hoffman. Many in the cryptocurrency community argue that XRP’s price was suppressed due to the prolonged legal uncertainty, and its recent gains indicate renewed investor confidence. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The debate over XRP is not new. Many critics throw around bad faith arguments like calling the digital asset centralized or a scam. However, supporters argue that Ripple’s technology has real-world use cases. This can be seen in its growing global adoption. The Bigger Picture This exchange highlights broader tensions within the cryptocurrency space, where competition between projects often leads to public criticism and accusations. While Chia Network promotes itself as an environmentally friendly alternative to traditional blockchain mining, its dramatic price decline raises concerns about its long-term viability. On the other hand, XRP’s resurgence suggests that legal challenges alone may not be enough to undermine a fundamentally strong project, the asset has outperformed the top 10 cryptocurrencies over the past week and isn’t showing signs of slowing down. While XRP is the third largest asset in the market and could be added to the U.S. strategic crypto reserve , Chia is a struggling asset that may never reclaim its lofty all-time high. title: Elon Musk’s DOGE could be on a collision course with Trump supporters with NASA assignment
body: The Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), led by Elon Musk, recently began an audit of NASA’s spending and contracts. The department is paying particular attention to the Artemis project, which was set up to lead another trip to the moon. The Artemis program was launched during President Donald Trump’s first term and has experienced cost overruns and delays. The program has flown only one mission since launch and due to delays, it postponed the first crewed lunar landing to 2027. The program has faced heavy criticism from several organizations and individuals, including the CEO of SpaceX and DOGE leader, Elon Musk. Ironically, SpaceX plays a key role in Artemis and has a multibillion-dollar contract to build a lunar lander. Now, Elon Musk is spearheading the investigation into NASA. It’s unclear so far how thorough the audit will be as it is still in its early stages. The Artemis audit could have political implications While it’s unclear how much DOGE intends to change the Artemis program, the program might encounter significant challenges with Trump’s incoming political appointees. DOGE could be in the position to disrupt NASA’s moon program through discussions with the Office of Management and Budget. The decision about whether or not to continue funding the program will ultimately come down to Congress, which retains sole charge of approving any proposed changes to specific programs. Senator Ted Cruz said that he plans on reintroducing a NASA authorization bill “very soon” that will mandate no changes to Artemis for at least a year. But under the new administration, it is unclear whether the bill will be approved. Many Republican lawmakers have fallen in line with Trump and his agenda. However, lawmakers like Cruz and Babin remain staunch believers in NASA’s mission to recreate the moon landing. Other Republican lawmakers are embracing Musk’s efforts to shrink the US government, even if it comes at the cost of jobs. The Artemis program supports tens of thousands of jobs in states like Texas, Alabama, Mississippi, and Florida. Texas. “I think that his involvement is great. I think we ought to figure out how to do things the most efficient way we can.” Senator Rick Scott, a Florida Republican, said in an interview. DOGE’s NASA audit DOGE’s audit of NASA’s expenditures and contracts will especially scrutinize the $93B Artemis program. The efficiency watchdog’s first order of business was to analyze the workforce data. It pledged a comprehensive audit of the agency’s spending. NASA Administrator Janet Petro confirmed DOGE’s presence and intentions. “They are going to look — similarly to what they’ve done at other agencies — at our payments,” he said. The Department of Government Efficiency has mapped out NASA’s management structure, including employee demographics and salaries. Musk previously criticized the program, describing it as “extremely inefficient” and a “jobs-maximizing program, not a results-maximizing program.” Despite the critiques, delays and cost overruns, the Artemis Program is an important part of local economies and as a result Congress has funneled billions of dollars to the program for years. title: ChatGPT Predicts Shiba Inu (SHIB) Price For the End of 2025
body: Shiba Inu (SHIB) is trading at $0.00001635, reflecting a 2.54% decrease from the previous day. SHIB began falling in early February, mirroring the broader market’s decline after tariff threats made by the Trump administration against key global trading partners. However, the digital asset is recovering, up almost 3% from last week. Despite some turbulence over the past 24 hours, the community is still optimistic about the asset’s future, and we consulted ChatGPT to see if that optimism will pay off in the long term. Projected SHIB Price by the End of 2025 We asked what SHIB’s price would be by the end of 2025, and ChatGPT outlined three possible scenarios. In a bearish case, where market conditions deteriorate or interest in SHIB declines, the price could drop to $0.000005 – $0.00001. A decline of this magnitude would be a massive blow to the SHIB ecosystem, as the developers and community have put in lots of effort to build it up. However, there is a good chance the asset will experience growth. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 ChatGPT outlined a neutral scenario, in which SHIB maintains steady adoption and continues its token burn initiatives . ChatGPT predicted that the digital asset could range between $0.00002 and $0.00005 if there are no major catalysts for further growth. Reaching $0.00005 would be a significant milestone, as it would be SHIB’s highest level since it fell from its all-time high in 2021. The asset surged towards this level in March 2024, but faced significant resistance, turning back at $0.00004534. With steady growth, it could surpass this level and hit $0.00005. However, ChatGPT outlined that if the market remains strong and SHIB’s ecosystem expands significantly, a bullish outcome could push the price between $0.0001 and $0.0005. These targets represent new all-time highs for SHIB and would validate the high expectations and lofty targets set by analysts. Key Factors Influencing SHIB Price ChatGPT outlined several factors that could determine the digital asset’s price movement in the coming year. Bitcoin’s market cycle is a major influence, as historical trends show that altcoins often follow Bitcoin’s trajectory. The expansion of SHIB’s ecosystem is another crucial factor. The success of Shibarium, DeFi applications, and metaverse projects could drive demand. If these initiatives gain traction, the cryptocurrency may see increased adoption and a massive price increase. title: XRP at a Critical Crossroads: Which Levels Need to Be Breached to Be Bullish? Which Levels Should Be Maintained To Avoid The Bear?
body: Cryptocurrency analytics firm MakroVision has released its latest update on XRP, revealing signs of a potential breakout. After a strong rally, XRP has broken through key resistance levels and is now testing a critical downtrend line. According to MakroVision, XRP recently broke through multiple resistance levels and is currently positioned at the red downtrend line, a key level to confirm a direct bullish reversal. title: Ray Dalio Issues Warning, Says US Government Approaching ‘Debt Death Spiral’ As Interest Payments Soar
body: Iconic investor Ray Dalio says the US government is headed toward a “debt death spiral” due to chronically large deficits. In a new interview on CNBC, the Bridgewater Associates founder says that in healthy credit cycles, all parties including the debtor, creditor and market can benefit from the flow of new money in the system. However, Dalio says that the US government is issuing so much debt that it’s likely overpowering buy-side demand, raising the potential that it will need to begin borrowing money to service existing debt, triggering a death spiral. The billionaire likens it to a human’s circulatory system. “The credit system, I think of like being the circulatory system in your body that, like blood brings different parts of your body, it brings these nutrients, the buying power. And if it’s used well so that it produces income, then everybody prospers. The lender gets paid back, and the person who borrowed it used it to be productive. It’s great. At those times, you don’t see debts rise relative to income. However, when debts rise relative to incomes on a chronic basis for a long time, it’s like plaque in that system accumulating. Think of it this way: the more debt and debt service you have, the less money you can spend out of your income. So as it rises right now, for the US government it’s almost a trillion dollars a year that goes to interest payments, so it’s sort of like plaque that narrows that and it’s a problem. There is also a supply/demand issue for credit, like every other market. So that when we have run a large deficit – and now the deficit is projected to be about 7.5% percent of GDP – when you run a large deficit, you have to sell the debt to do that and the quantity of debt sold has to come up against how many buyers are there. And when I calculate it, the quantity of debt to be sold is much greater than the buying power or the inclination to buy… Now in the private market’s credit markets, we talk about a ‘debt death spiral.’ A ‘debt death spiral’ is that part of the cycle when the debtor needs to borrow money in order to pay debt service, and it accelerates and then everyone sees that and they don’t want to hold the debt. That’s what we’re approaching.” To avoid the death spiral, Dalio says that the US should move to cut its deficit from 7.5% to 3% of GDP – which he dubs “the 3% solution” – something that can be achieved largely through cutting spending and lowering interest rates. “If it’s not done this time, I really worry. I think that everyone who is responsible for that, from the president to the Congress, should recognize… That if they don’t get it down to that, that they are responsible for the consequences that will follow.” Don't Miss a Beat – Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: XRP Exchange Reserves On Binance Hit $9.6 Billion
body: XRP exchange reserves on Binance have risen significantly, reaching $9.6 billion, according to data from CryptoQuant. This development has drawn attention from market analysts and investors, including crypto researcher Xaif (@Xaif_03), who highlighted the significance of this trend in a recent tweet. Xaif pointed out that the simultaneous rise in reserves and price suggests strong market demand, potentially driven by institutional accumulation or increased investor interest. $XRP Exchange Reserves on Binance Surge to $9.6B as Price Hits $3.1 The simultaneous rise in both reserves and price suggests strong market demand, possibly driven by institutional accumulation or increased investor interest. pic.twitter.com/b2iiSzJypF — 𝕏aif | (@Xaif_Crypto) February 15, 2025 Significance of Rising Exchange Reserves Exchange reserves refer to the amount of a particular cryptocurrency held in exchange wallets. When reserves increase, it can suggest that investors and institutions are moving their assets onto exchanges, either for trading or strategic positioning. In the case of XRP, the sharp increase in exchange reserves coinciding with a price surge suggests a strong demand for the asset. Historically, a rise in exchange reserves can signal different market behaviors. While some interpret it as an indication of selling pressure, in this case, the simultaneous price increase suggests an alternative explanation. The demand for XRP appears strong enough to counterbalance potential sell-offs, pointing toward accumulation rather than distribution. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Xaif’s Analysis and Institutional Involvement Crypto analyst Xaif (@Xaif_03) emphasized the potential role of institutional accumulation in this development. Large-scale investors or institutions may increase their XRP holdings, anticipating further price appreciation. This aligns with a broader trend in the cryptocurrency market, where institutional participation has risen significantly in recent years. Xaif’s observation also suggests that increased market confidence could be a driving factor. Regulatory clarity surrounding XRP has been a crucial element in its price movements, and any positive developments in this area could encourage investors to increase their holdings. XRP Price Performance and Market Sentiment The price of XRP reaching $3.1 represents a significant milestone. It reflects a strong uptrend and suggests that market sentiment is bullish. The correlation between rising reserves and price indicates that buyers are actively acquiring XRP, supporting the upward momentum. Technical analysis also plays a role in market behavior. The breakout to $3.1 may have triggered additional buying as traders seek opportunities to capitalize on the price movement. If the uptrend continues, XRP could attract further interest from both retail and institutional investors. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. title: Top Altcoins to Watch This Week: Binance Coin (BNB), Litecoin (LTC) and XRP Might Rebound Strongly
body: The post Top Altcoins to Watch This Week: Binance Coin (BNB), Litecoin (LTC) and XRP Might Rebound Strongly appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Last week, the cryptocurrency market was pretty unstable because of the latest inflation reports. This caused prices of many altcoins like BNB, Litecoin, and XRP to correct downward, hovering around dips. Despite this, big investors saw it as a chance to buy more, which could lead to a significant price recovery for these altcoins this week. ETF Related Developments Boost Market Hope Despite the overall market being in a correction mode, recent events around ETFs have made people more interested in a potential rebound in altcoins. Read more: Why Bitcoin Analyst and Influencer PlanB Convert His Bitcoin Into ETFs? This week, XRP became particularly noteworthy after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) recognized ETF filings by Grayscale and 21Shares for XRP. Additionally, there’s growing excitement about potential ETFs for SOL and DOGE, following the SEC’s positive response to cryptocurrency-backed ETF filings. This has left investors several reasons to witness a rebound in leading altcoin prices this week. Binance Coin (BNB) Price Analysis Binance Coin (BNB) recently saw a drop in buying interest after it couldn’t maintain its momentum above $700. Sellers are now targeting a retest of $650. Currently, BNB is priced at $656, showing a 0.2% decline in the last 24 hours. The BNB/USDT trading pair is eyeing a rise to $689, but it might face strong resistance that could push its price down to $648. With the Relative Strength Index (RSI) at 48, just below neutral, BNB could face a rebound. However, if BNB’s price can break above $689, it might climb towards $725. Conversely, if it drops below $648, the price could fall further to $623. Litecoin (LTC) Price Analysis Litecoin is attempting a strong recovery as it surges toward the high of $137. Though bears are defending resistance levels, LTC price might continue to charge ahead. As of writing, LTC price trades at $133, surging over 3% in the last 24 hours and 25% in the last seven days. If Litecoin price drops below the 20-day EMA, sellers will likely push the LTC/USDT pair down to the key support level at $114. While buyers will attempt to hold this level, if sellers dominate, the price could further decrease to $100. On the other hand, if Litecoin breaks and closes above the resistance zone and surges past $150, it could signal that the bearish pressure has ended. The price could then climb to the much-anticipated milestone of $200. XRP Price Analysis XRP’s recent trading activity, which had been stuck between $2.27 and $2.55, broke upward and is now consolidating below $2.8. The buyers are now working to increase their advantage by keeping the price above the $2.8 consolidation. If they succeed, the XRP/USDT pair might reach the next resistance level at $3.4. Also read: XRP Price Prediction For February 16 However, if the price sharply fails to hold the current momentum, it will indicate that sellers are still influential at higher prices. This could lead to XRP retesting buyers’ patience at $2.5

title: Analyst Says XRP Bounce Off Is Real, Sets Normal Measured and Conservative Price Targets
body: Crypto analyst EGRAG CRYPTO has shared a detailed analysis of XRP’s price action, highlighting the development of a Bullish Pennant formation on the weekly chart. This technical pattern suggests a potential breakout following a period of consolidation. The price has been forming lower highs and higher lows within a triangular structure after a strong upward move, known as the pole leg. If this pattern follows through, XRP could experience a significant surge. EGRAG CRYPTO identifies two major price targets based on the pennant’s measured move. The conservative target is $15, calculated from the lower end of the pennant. The normally measured move projects XRP reaching $17 , based on the upper portion of the pennant. These targets indicate significant upside potential if the breakout materializes. #XRP – The Bounce Off is Real! ($15-$17): The Bullish Pennant formation remains intact! Conservative Target: Measure the pole leg from the lower end of the pennant—this brings us to $15. Normal Measured Move: Measure the pole leg from the top of the pennant,… pic.twitter.com/XYul2LfyL9 — EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) February 15, 2025 $3.40 as the Confirmation Level Despite the bullish outlook, EGRAG CRYPTO emphasizes the importance of confirmation before assuming a breakout. The key resistance level to watch is $3.40. A weekly or monthly close above this level is necessary to validate the bullish scenario. Without this confirmation, there remains a risk of false breakouts or extended consolidation. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 In addition to resistance levels, the yellow trendline on the chart has been a long-term support level for XRP. The bullish structure remains intact as long as the price continues to respect this trendline. However, if XRP falls below this support, it could indicate a shift in momentum toward a bearish trend, potentially invalidating the bullish pennant formation. Cautious Optimism Amid Market Uncertainty While EGRAG CRYPTO’s analysis presents a strong case for XRP’s bullish potential , he warns against premature celebrations. Traders should wait for confirmation signals before assuming a sustained uptrend. External market conditions, regulatory developments, and broader crypto trends could all play a role in influencing XRP’s trajectory. In summary, XRP’s chart shows a promising Bullish Pennant formation, with potential upside targets at $15 and $17. However, for this scenario to unfold, the price must close above $3.40 and maintain support along the yellow trendline. As of press time, XRP is trading at $2.77, reflecting a price increase of 0.83%. Investors and traders should remain cautious, focusing on key breakout confirmations before making strategic decisions. body: Investor sentiment toward the Federal Reserve’s rate path has weighed on Bitcoin spot ETFs, leading to $580.2 million in net outflows for the week ending February 14, as per Farside data. This marks the first week of outflows after six consecutive weeks of inflows. The Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund (FBTC) experienced the largest outflows

title: Qubetics, Polkadot, and Cosmos: Which Is the Next Crypto to Hit $1? Explore $TICS Presale, Interoperability, and Cross-Border Transaction Potential
body: The world of cryptocurrency is buzzing with excitement as new players continue to emerge and gain traction. Amid this growing interest, three projects have been grabbing attention: Qubetics, Polkadot, and Cosmos. These platforms are positioning themselves to be significant players in the crypto space, each offering something unique and solving real-world problems. But the question on everyone’s mind is: Which of these is the next crypto to hit $1 ? And how can each of them impact the future of digital finance? While each of these projects brings their own set of features and benefits to the table, the one that stands out as an exciting contender for future growth is Qubetics ($TICS). It’s already making waves in the industry with its presale, having raised more than $12.7 million and sold over 472 million tokens to over 19,900 holders. But why is everyone calling Qubetics the next big thing? Let’s dive into it and see how it stacks up against giants like Polkadot and Cosmos. In this article, we’ll break down the potential of Qubetics, Polkadot, and Cosmos, exploring their strengths, and how they could each become the next crypto to hit $1 . Let’s also look at how Qubetics ($TICS) is uniquely positioned to solve problems that its predecessors couldn’t, and why it’s well-suited for the future of blockchain and digital finance. Qubetics: Revolutionizing Cross-Border Transactions Let’s kick things off with Qubetics, the emerging powerhouse in the crypto space. If you’ve been paying attention to presales lately, you’ve probably heard about its cross-border transaction capabilities. Unlike traditional cryptocurrencies, Qubetics is designed with businesses, professionals, and individuals in mind, allowing them to engage in seamless, fast, and secure cross-border transactions. This could be a game-changer for the global financial ecosystem. Whether you’re a freelancer working with clients overseas or a business looking to streamline international payments, Qubetics makes the process more efficient and cost-effective. In the midst of the ongoing presale, Qubetics is already showing impressive numbers. The token, $TICS, is currently priced at $0.0733, and analysts are projecting that it could hit $1 after the presale ends, which would represent a 1262% ROI. That’s a massive potential upside, and it’s no wonder that so many investors are flocking to the presale. With more than 472 million tokens already sold, it’s clear that there’s serious interest in Qubetics, and its future prospects look bright. One of the biggest reasons Qubetics ($TICS) stands out is its focus on cross-border transactions. Traditional banking systems often charge hefty fees for international transactions, and they can take days to process. With Qubetics, the process is fast and affordable, making it an attractive option for businesses and individuals who need to send money across borders quickly. Imagine a world where sending money to a friend in another country is as easy as sending a text message. That’s the future Qubetics is working towards—and it’s already got over 19,800 holders backing it up. Polkadot: The Interoperability Champion Next up is Polkadot. This project aims to address a critical issue in the blockchain space: interoperability. The problem with many existing blockchain platforms is that they operate in silos, unable to communicate or exchange data with each other. Polkadot solves this problem by providing a framework that enables different blockchains to interoperate seamlessly. While Polkadot may not have the same flashy presale numbers as Qubetics, it’s still one of the most important projects in the space today. Polkadot’s ability to connect various blockchains makes it an attractive solution for businesses and developers who are looking to create cross-chain applications. This interoperability will be crucial as the blockchain ecosystem continues to grow and evolve. Polkadot’s consensus mechanism, called Nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS), allows the network to maintain security while also being more scalable than traditional Proof of Work systems. The platform also has a unique governance model that gives token holders a direct say in the future of the network. This decentralized governance structure is a big part of what makes Polkadot so appealing to investors and developers alike. While Polkadot is a strong contender in the race to become the next crypto to hit $1, it faces stiff competition from projects like Qubetics, which are focusing more on real-world use cases like cross-border transactions. However, Polkadot’s ability to enable interoperability between different blockchain networks positions it as a valuable player in the crypto ecosystem. Cosmos: The Internet of Blockchains Last but not least, we have Cosmos, often referred to as the “Internet of Blockchains.” Like Polkadot, Cosmos also focuses on solving the issue of blockchain interoperability. However, it takes a slightly different approach. Cosmos uses a hub-and-spoke model, where independent blockchains (called zones) connect to a central blockchain (the hub). This design allows Cosmos to facilitate communication and value transfer between different blockchains without compromising on security or scalability. One of the standout features of Cosmos is its Tendermint consensus algorithm, which allows for fast transaction speeds and high scalability. This makes it an attractive option for developers who need a platform that can handle a large volume of transactions quickly. Additionally, Cosmos provides developers with the tools to build their own blockchains, giving them greater flexibility in how they design and deploy their applications. While Cosmos has certainly made a name for itself in the blockchain space, it still faces competition from other projects like Polkadot and Qubetics. However, its focus on creating an interconnected blockchain ecosystem makes it a strong contender for the future of decentralized finance. Understanding Cross-Border Transactions: A Game-Changer for Crypto Before we wrap things up, let’s take a deeper dive into the importance of cross-border transactions and why they matter for the future of crypto. In the traditional financial world, sending money across borders is a slow, expensive, and often frustrating process. Whether you’re sending money to family members in another country or paying for goods and services overseas, the process is usually riddled with fees and delays. Cryptocurrencies like Qubetics are changing this dynamic by offering a faster, cheaper, and more efficient way to handle international transactions. With Qubetics and its focus on cross-border payments, businesses and individuals no longer have to rely on expensive and slow banks to handle their transactions. Instead, they can use blockchain technology to send money quickly and at a fraction of the cost. As the crypto space continues to evolve, cross-border transactions will become a key component of global finance. Whether it’s for remittances, international business payments, or even peer-to-peer transfers, the ability to send money across borders seamlessly will be essential for the growth of the digital economy. Conclusion: The Future of Digital Finance Is Bright In conclusion, Qubetics ($TICS), Polkadot, and Cosmos each bring something valuable to the table. While Polkadot and Cosmos are focused on interoperability and scalability, Qubetics is addressing the real-world pain point of cross-border transactions, positioning itself as a leading solution in the crypto space. With its ongoing presale and strong community backing, Qubetics is on track to become the next crypto to hit $1 , and potentially much higher in the future. So, if you’re looking for the next big thing in the crypto space, don’t sleep on Qubetics. Its presale is in its 21st stage, and with more than $12.7 million raised, there’s still time to get in on the action. Keep an eye on Qubetics, because it could very well be the next crypto to hit $1—and beyond. Qubetics is a blockchain project designed to streamline cross-border transactions, making international payments faster, cheaper, and more secure. How much has Qubetics raised in its presale? Qubetics has raised over $12.7 million in its ongoing presale, selling over 472 million tokens to more than 19,900 holders. What makes Qubetics different from Polkadot and Cosmos? How much could Qubetics’ token ($TICS) be worth after the presale? Analysts predict that $TICS could reach $1 after the presale, offering a 1262% ROI. title: Ethereum Historical Indicator Flashes Long-Term Buy Signal  – Is History Repeating?
body: Ethereum has been struggling below the $2,800 mark for days, unable to reclaim it as support to kickstart a recovery rally. This key level remains a significant barrier for bulls, and as the price continues to consolidate below it, bearish sentiment is growing. Many analysts call for a continuation of the downtrend, reflecting the downbeat mood in the market. Investors, who once believed Ethereum would rally alongside Bitcoin this year, are now showing signs of doubt. Related Reading: Bitcoin Forms Rounding Bottom – Expert Sees Push To $100K Next Week However, not everyone is bearish. Some investors remain optimistic, pointing to signs that Ethereum may be gearing up for a recovery phase. Crypto analyst Ali Martinez recently shared a technical analysis revealing that the TD Sequential indicator has flashed a buy signal on Ethereum’s weekly chart. This rare event has historically indicated the beginning of a significant trend reversal. Martinez points out that whenever this indicator is triggered during the weekly timeframe, Ethereum often follows with strong upward momentum, signaling a potential bullish phase ahead. As Ethereum hovers below the $2,800 resistance, traders and investors are watching closely. If history repeats itself and the TD Sequential signal proves accurate, Ethereum could surprise the market with an aggressive move into higher price levels. Ethereum Prepares For A Recovery Phase Ethereum is testing critical liquidity below the $3,000 level, a significant psychological price point that analysts believe will determine Ethereum’s performance in the coming weeks. This level has become a battleground between bulls and bears, with sentiment in the market remaining highly divided. Retail investors, losing confidence in the potential for a near-term recovery, continue to sell, contributing to downward pressure on the price. Meanwhile, larger players appear to be taking advantage of the dip, accumulating Ethereum at an accelerated pace, signaling confidence in the asset’s long-term potential. Martinez recently shared a technical analysis on X, highlighting a significant historical pattern on Ethereum’s weekly chart. Martinez noted that each time the TD Sequential indicator has flashed a buy signal near the lower boundary of Ethereum’s long-term ascending channel, prices have historically rebounded with strength. This indicator, widely used by traders to spot trend reversals, suggests that Ethereum may be nearing a pivotal moment. According to Martinez, a similar setup is unfolding now as Ethereum consolidates just below key resistance levels. If the TD Sequential signal plays out as it has in the past, Ethereum could be gearing up for a powerful recovery rally. Reclaiming the $3,000 level and holding it as support would mark the first step toward reversing the bearish trend and initiating a long-term uptrend. The coming weeks will be crucial for Ethereum as investors watch for signs of a breakout or a further decline. Related Reading: Dogecoin Adam & Eve Structure Hints At Bullish Potential – Can DOGE Breakout? ETH Consolidates Before A Big Move Ethereum (ETH) is trading at $2,690 after days of sideways trading and market indecision. This period of stagnation has left investors speculating about the short-term direction of ETH, as sentiment remains divided between bullish recovery and further downside potential. The lack of momentum above key resistance levels has contributed to uncertainty, with both bulls and bears struggling to take decisive control. For Ethereum to initiate a recovery uptrend, bulls must reclaim the $2,800 mark as support. This critical level has acted as a key barrier in recent weeks, and breaking above it would pave the way for a push toward the $3,000 mark. A successful move above $3,000, a psychological and technical resistance level, would confirm a reversal of the downtrend and establish bullish momentum in the market. Related Reading: Avalanche Holds Key Demand Zone – Analyst Sets $30 Target If Momentum Holds However, the risk of further downside remains if ETH fails to reclaim the $2,800 level. A retracement could take the price into lower demand zones around $2,500, where stronger support may be found. The next few trading sessions will be critical, as Ethereum’s price action will likely dictate market sentiment and influence its short-term trajectory. Investors are watching closely for a decisive breakout or further consolidation as the market remains uncertain. Featured image from Dall-E, chart from TradingView

title: Software Engineer: Only 5% of XRP In Circulation will be Tradable Publicly Eventually
body: Vincent Van Code, a well-known software engineer and crypto enthusiast, recently shared his perspective on the future of XRP and its role in global payments. His tweet highlights the importance of XRP’s utility beyond speculative trading and compares it to other cryptocurrencies, emphasizing its unique capabilities on the XRP Ledger (XRPL). Eventually, only 5% or less XRP circulating supply will be tradable publically. The rest will be locked away making the global payment industry billions of dollars as it is transacted. So why not lock all of it away? Because you need a free, open market where XRP can be sold… — Vincent Van Code (@vincent_vancode) February 15, 2025 The Future of XRP Supply and Utility Van Code suggests that only a small fraction—5% or less—of XRP’s circulating supply will be publicly tradable in the long run. The majority, he argues, will be locked away and utilized within financial institutions, making billions of dollars in transactions. This statement aligns with the broader view that XRP is designed as a bridge asset for institutional payments, reducing friction in cross-border transactions and liquidity management. However, he acknowledges the necessity of maintaining a free and open market for XRP. The ability to buy and sell XRP is crucial to mitigating counterparty risk in financial transactions. Without an open market, price discovery would be impossible, and the efficiency of XRP as a liquidity solution could be compromised. This perspective reflects how financial markets function, ensuring that assets used for settlement remain liquid and freely accessible. XRPL’s Capabilities vs. Other Cryptocurrencies Van Code urges those evaluating cryptocurrencies to research the capabilities of the XRP Ledger before making investment decisions. He contrasts XRPL’s features with meme coins like PEPE and DOGE, including the flagship crypto Bitcoin (BTC). While Bitcoin is often viewed as a store of value, its transaction speed and cost limitations make it less practical for real-time global payments. Meme coins, on the other hand, typically lack intrinsic utility and are driven primarily by speculation. The XRP Ledger is purpose-built for asset tokenization and has a native “sell anything for anything” functionality. This allows seamless transactions involving different asset types, a feature essential for global financial networks and enterprise adoption. The ability to tokenize and trade assets efficiently sets XRP apart from many other digital assets. His caution reflects a broader concern within the crypto space regarding market manipulation and the high volatility of leveraged positions. This discussion highlights the growing divide between utility-driven digital assets and speculative meme coins. As blockchain technology evolves, investors must distinguish between projects with long-term potential and those driven purely by hype. title: Bitcoin analyst moves BTC holdings to ETF, sparks community reaction
body: Bitcoin analyst PlanB has revealed a new move related to his Bitcoin holdings, a move that has sparked wide reactions from the Bitcoin community. He mentioned in a post on X that he has moved his Bitcoin into spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). According to his post, the Bitcoin analyst mentioned that the aim of the move is to manage Bitcoin more traditionally, the same way stocks and bonds are managed. PlanB mentioned that he wanted to eliminate the hassles and complexities of having to hold his wallet keys. “I guess I am not a maxi anymore,” the Bitcoin analyst said on X (formerly known as Twitter). The Bitcoin community did not find the post amusing, as they showed their displeasure. Most of them were worried about his statement about the keys, as they felt that the best way to keep their BTC safe was to be in charge of their keys. Bitcoin analyst moves BTC stash into ETFs According to his post, the Bitcoin analyst mentioned that not worrying over his wallet keys gives him peace of mind, a move that the Bitcoin community has frowned at. While Bitcoin holders, especially Maxis like PlanB have been in charge of their wallet keys, it has also given them the daunting task of having to keep the keys safe from hackers, thieves, and bad actors. ⚠️ Disclosure ⚠️ I have transferred my bitcoin to ETFs. Yes I know, not your keys not your coins. But it is just easier for me to manage bitcoin the same way as equities and bonds. Also, not having to hassle with keys gives me peace of mind. I guess I am not a maxi anymore. — PlanB (@100trillionUSD) February 15, 2025 Private keys are like passwords to access one’s wallet, allowing the holder to be able to access their wallet when they wish. But the problem is keeping it safe from criminals and hackers. It is without a doubt that centralized exchanges provide the easiest avenue to store coins without the need to worry over your private key, however, the rate of crypto exchange hacks in the industry is discouraging users. According to a December report shared by on-chain security firm Cyvers, hackers stole $2.3 billion in assets across 165 incidents, signifying a 40% increase from the previous year. In the report, the Blockchain security firm highlighted a disturbing trend, noting that most of the hacks were a result of access control breaches that happened on centralized exchanges and crypto custodians. It represented $1.9 billion of the entire hack, 81% of the total funds stolen. Bitcoin community reacts to PlanB’s revelation The news did not seem to go well with most of PlanB’s 2 million followers on X, with the revelations bringing a barrage of criticisms his way. Some users questioned the need to reveal such information, while others did not understand why he would advocate giving control of his assets to an online platform. He admitted that he did not know that Bitcoin ETFs were controversial. Replying to a user who asked that he change his name to PlanETF, he mentioned that he sees Bitcoin ETFs as the next logical step to Bitcoin adoption. “In my view, ETFs are a logical step in Bitcoin adoption, next to holding your keys. Out of curiosity: would it be different in your opinion if I would have bought (Micro)Strategy instead of an ETF, or would that be equally evil?” he said. A user asked if the transfer triggered a taxable event. PlanB mentioned that selling was not taxed since his tax residency is in the Netherlands, adding that there is no capital gains tax on realized gains. He noted that instead, there is an unrealized gains tax. “The government assumes you make ~6% return on your entire wealth (per Jan 1st) and you pay ~30% tax. So you pay ~2% of your entire net wealth every year,” PlanB added. Despite his followers disagreeing with his move, there is a consensus in the market where returns from Bitcoin investments are the same. According to the Chief Investment Officer of Yield App, Lucas Kiely, the returns are the same, with the only difference being the management fees that ETF companies charge their users. Meanwhile, Bitwise investment chief Matt Hougan has also tipped US spot Bitcoin ETFs to surpass $50 billion in inflows this year. “So far, so good: Spot Bitcoin ETFs pulled in $4.94 billion in January, which annualizes to ~$59 billion,” he said. In another post, Hougan and another Bitwise exec Ryan Rasmussen predicted that Bitcoin ETF inflows this year will be higher than 2024. body: The cryptocurrency market is buzzing with activity, hinting at a possible new wave of excitement. Investors are particularly focused on certain altcoins that are gaining traction. This could be a crucial moment, as strong signals point toward a forming bullish trend. Among the altcoins attracting attention are Solana, Avalanche, Polkadot, Chainlink, and Toncoin. Agent A.I.: Fusing AI Capabilities with Meme Coin Popularity Agent A.I. is a fresh cryptocurrency project that melds AI-driven features with the viral charm of meme coins, tapping into two of today's major trends. Interest in AI-driven crypto projects has exploded, with blockchain-based AI solutions capturing more investor attention. However, not every AI token delivers real value, as many use "AI" merely as a marketing gimmick. Agent A.I.'s Role in the Crypto-AI Surge Agent A.I. sets itself apart by merging AI innovation with blockchain utility, while also critiquing projects that fail to deliver on their AI promises. This strategy allows Agent A.I. to stand out in a crowded field. Agent A.I. is crafted to be a smart and flexible platform. According to its creators, the AI framework of the project can: Analyze vast amounts of data in milliseconds to enhance decision-making Boost processing capabilities to rival top cloud platforms Continuously improve its performance, learning and evolving over time. The team behind Agent A.I. is dedicated to enhancing both AI features and blockchain integration, ensuring the technology advances alongside the crypto market. A Strategic Presale Model for Early Backers Agent A.I. is employing a community-focused presale model, offering early participants the chance to engage with the project at optimal prices. The presale follows a structured, multi-phase approach, rewarding early investors with significant discounts: In the initial stage, the $AGNT token is priced at $0.003333333. This pricing plan implies that the sooner you invest, the greater the discount you receive. Secure Your $AGNT Before the Next Price Increase Why $AGNT Stands Out as an Investment Agent A.I. merges two of today's most enticing elements in the crypto space: AI-driven progress and meme coin viral appeal. The project's emphasis on genuine AI capabilities and community-centric growth positions it as a notable entry among new crypto ventures. With a limited supply for presale and ascending price tiers, $AGNT provides early investors with the potential for significant returns as its adoption increases. The Agent A.I. Community is Growing – Join the Mission Now! Solana: Pioneering the Future with Speedy Blockchain Solutions Solana is a blockchain platform introduced in 2020 by Anatoly Yakovenko, designed to tackle the speed and scalability challenges of Bitcoin and Ethereum. Capable of processing over 50,000 transactions per second with minimal fees, it ranks among the fastest blockchains. Its efficiency stems from innovations like Proof-of-History and Proof-of-Stake mechanisms, enabling effective transaction ordering and scaling without compromising security. This high throughput has drawn numerous developers and users to the platform. Since its inception, Solana's token, SOL, has experienced significant growth. By 2024, SOL reached an all-time high, surpassing many other cryptocurrencies, reflecting strong investor interest and trust in Solana's potential. Analysts forecast that SOL could achieve new milestones by 2025 and continue its upward trajectory into 2030. These predictions are based on Solana's technology, adoption, and the increasing demand for fast blockchain solutions, though they remain speculative and subject to change. In the current market, Solana stands out for its speed and scalability. Its technological advancements have attracted investors and developers. Despite competition, Solana's robust fundamentals and expanding ecosystem make it a project with significant promise in the blockchain sector. AVAX: A Strong Contender to Ethereum in 2025 Avalanche (AVAX) is a prominent blockchain network targeting Ethereum's dominance in smart contract capabilities. Launched in 2020, it has become a favored platform for developers due to its efficiency and speed. AVAX is compatible with Ethereum's programming language, easing project migration. The native token, AVAX, is essential for governance and transaction validation through a proof-of-stake system. A key to its success is the network's capacity to handle 6,500 transactions per second, greatly exceeding Ethereum's capabilities. Lower transaction fees make Avalanche more cost-effective for users. In recent years, AVAX has demonstrated remarkable growth. Despite a notable decline from its all-time high of $146.22 in November 2021, the coin has been on a recovery path. With improving market sentiment, particularly after Bitcoin's halving in April 2024, AVAX seems poised for further advances. Long-term predictions for AVAX are positive. Some analysts foresee it reaching $100.08 by 2030, indicating substantial growth potential. The coin's limited supply and the burning of transaction fees add to its scarcity, which could drive its value upward. For investors assessing the current market cycle, AVAX presents an attractive opportunity. Its strong fundamentals, advanced network features, and growing community support position it well for future success. As Avalanche continues to innovate and challenge Ethereum, AVAX could be a coin to watch in the coming years. Polkadot in 2025: Connecting Blockchains and Reaching New Levels Polkadot is a decentralized protocol that enables communication between blockchains. As a Layer 0 solution, it facilitates cross-chain transactions, boosting interoperability in the crypto ecosystem. Founded by Gavin Wood, co-founder of Ethereum, Polkadot aims to bridge isolated blockchains and foster a more interconnected environment. After reaching a peak of $55 in 2021, DOT has varied with market fluctuations. Despite challenges and new cross-chain solutions reducing some of Polkadot's initial purposes, its active community remains confident in the platform's superior technology and potential. In 2025, Polkadot finds itself at a crucial juncture. Its unique method of blockchain connectivity keeps it pertinent amid skepticism about the need for alternatives to Ethereum. The community believes Polkadot can surpass competitors by offering unmatched interoperability and scalability. Price forecasts for DOT are diverse. DigitalCoinPrice predicts an average of $16.29 in 2026 and $23.75 by 2027. Changelly estimates DOT between $9.96 and $11.52 in 2026. By 2030, some optimistic projections suggest DOT could reach $36.63, still below its all-time high, but indicating significant growth. Considering these aspects, DOT presents an enticing investment opportunity in 2025. Its emphasis on interoperability and a committed development team suggest growth potential. Investors should weigh its technological strengths and the evolving blockchain landscape when considering Polkadot's role in their portfolios. Chainlink: Connecting Smart Contracts to Real-World Data Chainlink (LINK) is revolutionizing the blockchain industry by linking smart contracts with external data. Smart contracts require accurate data to function properly, yet they cannot access off-network data independently. Chainlink addresses this issue through oracles—secure middleware that retrieves off-chain data and integrates it on-chain. This decentralized oracle network ensures data reliability and availability, with no single point of failure. The LINK token drives the Chainlink ecosystem. It's used to compensate node operators (oracles) for their services. Operators set fees based on data demand, and staking LINK enables them to participate in the network. Since its launch in 2017, Chainlink has become a leader in decentralized oracle solutions, expanding its partnerships and use cases. Historically, LINK has experienced considerable price fluctuations. In May 2021, it reached an all-time high of approximately $52.88. Despite subsequent volatility, many believe that increasing adoption of decentralized finance (DeFi) will elevate its value. As DeFi apps depend on accurate off-chain data, demand for Chainlink's services—and, consequently, LINK tokens—is expected to grow. Looking forward, some experts are optimistic about LINK's future. Analysts like Michael van de Poppe suggest LINK could see significant growth in the coming years. While predictions vary, there's a general expectation that if Chainlink continues expanding its network and forming new partnerships, LINK's value could rise substantially. In the current market cycle, Chainlink is well-positioned. Its unique technology addresses a vital need in the blockchain ecosystem. As more projects require dependable data feeds, Chainlink's role becomes increasingly important. Investors and enthusiasts are keen to see how Chainlink will continue evolving and whether it will exceed its previous peaks in the future. Toncoin's Ascent: Could It Be the Future of Cryptocurrency? Toncoin (TON) is gaining significant attention in the crypto sphere. Initially developed by the Durov brothers in 2018, it was designed for rapid transactions. Today, it's a versatile platform supporting various applications, from digital wallets to NFTs. Using the Open Network blockchain, TON employs a proof-of-stake model to ensure scalability and security. Its unique TON wallet enables fast, secure transactions without intermediaries. The network's impressive speed distinguishes it from other blockchains. In the current market cycle, many investors find TON appealing. Its robust technological foundation and expanding ecosystem suggest substantial growth potential. Recognition of TON as one of the fastest blockchains further enhances its attractiveness. Historically, TON has shown significant progress. It reached an all-time high of $7.65 in April 2024, a remarkable rise from an all-time low of $0.39 in September 2021. This upward trend reflects growing interest and confidence in Toncoin's future. Looking ahead, analysts predict that TON could reach $10 by the end of 2025. Long-term forecasts are even more optimistic, with potential prices of $22.51 by 2026 and $47.95 by 2030. While these are speculative, they underline the strong belief in Toncoin's growth prospects. Conclusion In summary, while established altcoins like Solana (SOL), Avalanche (AVAX), Polkadot (DOT), and Chainlink (LINK) continue to show promise, they might offer less immediate growth in the short term. Their consistent development and adoption are important, but the explosive potential to kickstart the next altseason might be found elsewhere. title: Bitcoin (BTC) Consolidates at $97K, Official Trump (TRUMP) and Other Meme Coins Bleed Out Heavily (Weekend Watch)
body: The last 24 hours have been relatively quiet for Bitcoin (BTC) and some of the large-cap altcoins. The primary cryptocurrency has shown very slight volatility, trading at almost the same level observed yesterday (February 15). Such is the case with many of its biggest rivals, including Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), and more. On the other hand, the meme coin sector has suffered substantial losses, with Official Trump (TRUMP) being among the worst-affected assets. BTC Barely Moves The last business week has been rather turbulent for BTC, with its price fluctuating between under $95,000 and almost $99,000. Some of the factors that contributed to the enhanced volatility include Donald Trump’s intention to enforce additional tariffs on certain stocks entering the USA and the latest CPI data released by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics. However, the weekend has been calm so far. BTC settled at around $97,500 on February 15 and in the following hours it consolidated at that level . This represents a mere 0.5% on a weekly scale. BTC Price, Source: CoinMarketCap The asset’s market capitalization remains unchanged at $1.93 trillion, while its dominance against the alternative coins remains slightly increased to 59.8% (per CoinMarketCap’s data). How are the Alts Doing? The overall consolidation of the crypto market has spread to some of the most popular altcoins. Ethereum (ETH) has stabilized at roughly $2,700, Ripple (XRP) continues to trade around the $2.80 mark, while Solana (SOL) hovers at approximately $195. Nonetheless, there are some charting solid gains. Litecoin (LTC) has pumped by 4% in the last 24 hours to a monthly high of over $135, whereas TRON (TRX) has climbed by 2.5% for that timeframe. Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Avalanche (AVAX), Hedera (HBAR), Hyperliquid (HYPE), and others have suffered minor declines. Meanwhile, the meme coin niche is covered in red today. Official Trump (TRUMP) – the token launched by US President Donald Trump – has plummeted by 10% to the current $18.60. Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Bonk Inu (BONK), dogwifhat (WIF), and many more have also experienced losses. The total cryptocurrency market capitalization currently stands at roughly $3.23 trillion, representing a 0.18% decrease for the day . Cryptocurrency Market Overview, Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Bitcoin (BTC) Consolidates at $97K, Official Trump (TRUMP) and Other Meme Coins Bleed Out Heavily (Weekend Watch) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: What’s the Latest on XRP, Dogecoin, Litecoin and Cardano ETFs? Have the Chances of Approval Strengthened?
body: Cryptocurrency journalist Eleanor Terrett recently shared her views on the ongoing controversy surrounding the XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) and its implications for the coin’s regulatory classification. In his statement, Terrett addressed speculations about whether the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) would classify XRP as a commodity when considering ETF applications. He explained that the SEC is familiar with issuers applying for XRP-based ETF products that classify the asset as a commodity within a security wrapper. This structure is similar to how Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) ETFs are treated. “You’ve seen the SEC recently evaluate several of these products along with other underlying assets that previous SEC filings considered securities, such as Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Cardano (ADA),” Terrett said. Related News: XRP at a Critical Crossroads: Which Levels Need to Be Breached to Be Bullish? Which Levels Should Be Maintained To Avoid The Bear? However, he noted that the SEC has also paused litigation related to cryptocurrency classifications while considering these applications. The SEC’s Crypto Asset and Cyber Division is currently evaluating the regulatory framework for digital assets, which could explain the delay in decisive action. Terrett speculated that the SEC’s broader review of various crypto ETF applications could be an attempt to avoid accusations of favoritism. “The SEC may be looking at everything because they don’t want to be seen as picking winners and losers,” he said. Despite this development, Terrett said the regulator’s position remains unclear until it takes further action on these applications. “While it’s certainly notable that they didn’t reject these products outright, I don’t think we’ll know for sure what the SEC thinks until they start looking more into these applications,” he said. He also made a statement regarding the status of ETF applications, stating that Grayscale has filed an application for a Cardano ETF, but the SEC has not yet considered it. However, the commission has officially considered applications for XRP, Solana, Dogecoin, and Litecoin (LTC). *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: What’s the Latest on XRP, Dogecoin, Litecoin and Cardano ETFs? Have the Chances of Approval Strengthened?

title: Apple to bring Apple Intelligence to Vision Pro in major software update
body: Apple Inc. is set to enhance its Vision Pro headset with the introduction of Apple Intelligence, an upgraded guest user mode, and a dedicated spatial content app. These new features will be part of the visionOS 2.4 software update, which is expected to roll out as early as April. According to sources familiar with the matter, a beta version for developers could be available as soon as this week. Apple brings AI to Vision Pro as Samsung expands mixed reality efforts For the first time, Apple is extending its artificial intelligence tools beyond the iPhone, iPad, and Mac to the Vision Pro. Through Apple Intelligence, the Vision Pro will support Writing Tools, Genmojis, and the Image Playground app. The headset’s Mac M2 chip and 16GB memory capacity permit on-device AI processing to boost system performance and efficiency. The competition within mixed-reality technology continues to escalate. Google announced its Android XR operating system with Gemini AI platform integration, and Samsung developed a Vision Pro equivalent headset, which will be released sometime this year. Apple’s Vision Pro may have started the buzz, but Samsung isn’t taking a backseat. Samsung’s ambitious mixed-reality headset, Project Moohan, is a serious headset with the potential to dominate the already crowded VR space. And the best part? It’s designed to work seamlessly with Android. While Apple launched its products in a closed environment, Samsung is focusing on an open system that is easy to use. Samsung is developing the headset in partnership with Google. It runs on Android XR, an OS designed specifically for headsets and smart glasses. Samsung plans to launch Project Moohan for developers first, but it won’t be available right away for consumers. Apple expands Vision Pro features amid mixed reality challenges Apple is introducing an innovative spatial content app that presents 3D images and panoramic content obtained from multiple sources. The tech firm struggles to produce content for spatial media, so the company seeks to build more interest in this domain. Apple will also deliver its immersive Arctic surfing video through the TV app on Vision Pro starting February 21. Although Apple continues to develop its AI capabilities, this software update will not feature new Siri functionality. However, the Writing Tools feature will now incorporate OpenAI’s ChatGPT integration. The update provides enhanced guest user mode functionality, which enables easy device sharing for Vision Pro users. The setup process will now function through an iPhone, enabling users to determine which apps their guests can use. The updated feature enables household users to use the device more comfortably, boosting device usage and sales. A view of visionOS from the Apple Vision Pro. Source: Apple Despite launching the Vision Pro a year ago, the Apple project faces difficulties in reaching broad market adoption because of its expensive $3,500 price and insufficient content options. After shelving its rumored plans for Mac-tethered augmented reality glasses, Apple continues to develop its mixed-reality product range . The project discontinuation was met with widespread disappointment and skepticism. Macworld argued that the company had killed off the wrong Vision Pro project , while many pundits questioned its appetite for fighting in what could be an important future market. Still, according to respected Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Apple hasn’t given up on the AR market. In the latest edition of his Power On newsletter, he writes that the tech firm still wants to release a pair of standalone AR glasses at some point. However, after Vision Pro’s disappointing performance, Gurman notes that Apple has become cautious and wants to avoid another failure in the near term. For now, Apple continues to develop its spatial computing vision through its Vision Pro software improvements, which it expects will drive the necessary momentum to revive consumer interest and increase adoption. This article highlights five alternative cryptos that could offer even greater potential than the leading name. Uncover these exciting digital assets that might redefine the future of finance. Crowned Best NEW Meme Project, it blends the electric energy of sports with meme culture, drawing in millions of fans who want to be part of something bigger. Every great story needs a hero. Not the biggest, not the strongest—just the one crazy enough to keep pushing forward. That’s XYZepe, the masked fighter, the die-hard believer, and the relentless holder of $XYZ. His mission is to bring XYZVerse to the top of CoinMarketCap and carve XYZ into crypto history. In response, the CMC community is totally behind this future champ: 95% are super bullish on $XYZ. But greatness isn’t handed out—it’s earned in the ring. $XYZ has already passed through 9 out of 15 presale stages, and the thriving community helps it build momentum for a mindblowing take off. Undervalued at $0.002, $XYZ is a bet worth making. By the end of presale, it’s set to soar to $0.1. The fight isn’t over, but the path to glory is clear. Champions Get Rewarded In XYZVerse, the community calls the plays. Active contributors aren’t just spectators—they’re rewarded with airdropped XYZ tokens for their dedication. It’s a game where the most passionate players win big. The Road to Victory With solid tokenomics, strategic CEX and DEX listings, and consistent token burns, $XYZ is built for a championship run. Every play is designed to push it further, to strengthen its price, and to rally a community of believers who know this isn’t just another meme coin—it’s the start of something legendary. XYZepe is fighting for glory. Are you ready to join the ring? ADA: Cardano's Path to a Sustainable Crypto Future Cardano is turning heads in the cryptocurrency world with its fresh approach. It's a flexible and scalable blockchain platform designed for smart contracts. This means it supports the creation of decentralized finance apps, crypto tokens, and games. At its core is ADA, Cardano's native cryptocurrency. ADA is a rival to Ethereum's ETH, allowing users to store value, make payments, and participate in staking on the Cardano network. What makes Cardano stand out is its commitment to sustainability and efficiency. Instead of using energy-heavy methods like some other cryptocurrencies, it employs the Ouroboros proof-of-stake mechanism, which is kinder to the environment. Cardano's blockchain is divided into two layers: one for transactions and one for smart contracts. This clever design boosts its ability to process transactions, potentially handling up to a million per second. With the launch of Cardano native tokens in March 2021, users can interact securely with smart contracts while enjoying low fees. In today's market, where there's a growing interest in eco-friendly and efficient cryptocurrencies, ADA's innovative technology makes it a noteworthy contender. Avalanche (AVAX): The Eco-Friendly Blockchain Racing Ahead Avalanche is making waves in the blockchain world. It's a Layer-1 platform known for being eco-friendly and fast. With low fees and the ability to process 4,500 transactions per second, it's designed for speed and efficiency. One of its standout features is the option for users to create their own customizable Subnets. This makes Avalanche flexible and adaptable to different needs. At the heart of Avalanche is its native token, AVAX. It's used for transaction fees, staking to secure the network, and powering Subnets. Avalanche uses a hybrid consensus mechanism, aiming to finalize transactions in under two seconds. With three interoperable chains, it handles everything from simple transactions to smart contracts. In today's market, where speed and sustainability are important, Avalanche stands out among other cryptocurrencies. Its technology and features make it a strong player in the evolving blockchain landscape. Chainlink: Connecting Smart Contracts to the Real World Chainlink is a decentralized network that helps smart contracts access real-world data. Smart contracts usually operate only within a blockchain and can't fetch external information on their own. Chainlink solves this by using oracles—nodes that bring in data from outside sources. These oracles retrieve information, like prices or weather conditions, and deliver it securely to the blockchain. Chainlink ensures the data is reliable by checking sources and using a reputation system. This bridge between blockchains and the real world makes smart contracts more useful and versatile. In today's market, Chainlink's LINK token is gaining attention for its practical use. As more people and businesses explore decentralized finance and smart contracts, the need for accurate data becomes crucial. Chainlink is well-placed to meet this demand with its secure and efficient data delivery system. Compared to other cryptocurrencies, LINK has a clear purpose that supports the growing blockchain ecosystem. While market conditions can change, Chainlink's focus on enhancing how smart contracts interact with real-world data positions it as an interesting player in the crypto space. POL: The Utility Token Energizing Polygon’s Expanding Ecosystem The Polygon Ecosystem Token, or POL, is the lifeblood of the Polygon network's vast and growing landscape. Acting as a utility token, POL is essential for a multitude of operations and services within the ecosystem. One key function is staking, where holders can lock their tokens to support network security and participate in consensus mechanisms. In return, they earn rewards based on the amount staked, fostering an engaged and supportive community. POL also empowers holders with governance rights, allowing them to vote on proposals that shape the network's future. This inclusive approach ensures that the ecosystem evolves in line with the community's vision. Moreover, POL provides access to exclusive services, unlocking unique features and applications within the network. As decentralized finance and blockchain adoption continue to rise, tokens like POL that offer multifaceted utility are gaining attention. While the crypto market is ever-changing, POL's integral role in the Polygon ecosystem positions it as a noteworthy token in the current market landscape.
